skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.

security_audit.summary: Official skill from Anthropic. Minimal audit performed with no issues detected. Safe for marketplace publication.

content.user_title: Apply Anthropic brand styling to artifacts
content.value_statement: You need consistent Anthropic branding across documents and slides. This skill applies official colors and typography with sensible defaults.
actual_capabilities: Applies Poppins to headings at 24pt and larger with Arial fallback
Applies Lora to body text with Georgia fallback
Uses Anthropic main and accent colors for text and shapes
Cycles orange, blue, and green accents for non-text shapes
Selects text colors based on background for readability
limitations: Relies on system-installed Poppins and Lora for best results
Falls back to Arial and Georgia when brand fonts are unavailable
Treats text under 24pt as body text
Uses only the Anthropic brand palette and accents

use_cases.title: Slide deck styling
use_cases.description: Apply brand colors and fonts to a presentation before client review.

use_cases.title: Campaign asset polish
use_cases.description: Bring flyers and one pagers into Anthropic brand compliance.

use_cases.title: Internal template refresh
use_cases.description: Standardize internal documents with consistent typography and colors.

prompt_templates.title: Basic brand apply
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand colors and typography to this artifact and keep the content unchanged.

prompt_templates.title: Slide deck update
prompt_templates.prompt: Restyle this slide deck using Anthropic colors, Poppins for headings, and Lora for body text with readable contrast.

prompt_templates.title: Typography focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Ensure headings at 24pt and larger use Poppins, body text uses Lora, and apply fallback fonts when needed.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced brand polish
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand colors and typography, cycle accent colors for shapes, and maintain clear hierarchy and readability.

output_examples.input: Apply Anthropic brand styling to my presentation.
output: Headings use Poppins with strong contrast
Body text uses Lora with readable colors
Shapes alternate orange, blue, and green accents
Backgrounds follow the light and dark palette

best_practices: Install Poppins and Lora for best visual match
Use the light and dark palette consistently across slides
Keep heading sizes at or above 24pt for proper font styling
anti_patterns: Mixing non brand fonts with branded text
Overusing accent colors on large backgrounds
Using low contrast text against dark or light backgrounds

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, it is a skill for those platforms and follows standard skill usage.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: It only applies Anthropic colors and typography and relies on system fonts.

faq.question: Can it integrate with presentation tools?
faq.answer: It applies styling rules and can be used in workflows that handle slides and documents.

faq.question: Is my data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: No data handling or network calls are defined in the skill content.

faq.question: What if fonts do not appear?
faq.answer: Install Poppins and Lora or rely on the automatic Arial and Georgia fallback.

faq.question: How does it compare to custom style guides?
faq.answer: It enforces Anthropic branding only and does not support custom palettes or fonts.
